40030000.English_Text:
(Let's ask the people
around the area.)

40030002.English_Text:
(Let's check the area
while eliminating the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Mandaravas</>.)
40030002.Chinese_Text:
（消灭曼陀罗的同时
查看周围吧。）

40030003.Original_Text: (흔적을 찾을 수 없다.\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>폭포</> 근처를 찾아 볼까?)
40030003.English_Text:
(I can't find any clues.
Should I search near the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>waterfall</>?)
40030003.Chinese_Text:
（找不到痕迹。
去瀑布附近找找吧？）

40030004.English_Text:
(What's that?
It looks like a ball.
Let's examine it closer.)
40030004.Chinese_Text:
（那是？看起来像球。
仔细看看吧。）

40030005.English_Text:
(It has <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</> written on it...
Maybe this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>bell</> is...?)

40030006.English_Text: (Let's go talk to the person on <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>patrol</>.)

40030007.English_Text:
(Let's meet that <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>colleague</>
and listen to what he has to say!)
40030007.Chinese_Text:
（去听听那个
同伴说什么吧！）

40030008.Chinese_Text:
（去问问那边的
队员们吧！）

40030011.English_Text:
(I took out a few animals,
but there seems to be no difference.)
40030011.Chinese_Text:
（虽然消灭了几只，
但看不出区别。）

40030012.Chinese_Text:
（现在这种情况下，
最好暂时停止巡逻...）

40030013.English_Text:
(Let's go to the last patrol site
and check if there's a monster.)
40030013.Chinese_Text:
（去最后的巡逻场所
看看有没有怪物吧。）

40030014.English_Text:
(Let's return to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>members</>
and tell them about this situation!)

40030016.English_Text:
(There must be a way to
make some food and fertilizer.)

40030017.English_Text:
(There's no choice
but to drive them out.)

40030018.Chinese_Text:
（做我力所能及
的事情吧！）

40030019.Chinese_Text:
（那边有绿角大鬼？
去看看吧？）

40030020.English_Text:
(The atmosphere here is strange...
Maybe I should search the area?)
40030020.Chinese_Text:
（这里的气氛很奇怪...
查看一下周围吧？）

40030021.English_Text:
(This doesn't really solve things,
but I should return and tell them!)
40030021.Chinese_Text:
（虽然没有完全解决，
还是回去转告吧！）

40030023.English_Text:
(I was asked to collect
those things, right?)

40030024.English_Text: (It might be easier than I thought.)

40030025.English_Text:
(What's that over there?
Let's go check!)
40030025.Chinese_Text:
（那是什么？
去确认一下吧！）

40030026.English_Text:
(The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue Bandits</> are here?
Are they trying to attack?)
40030026.Chinese_Text:
（青人族在这里？
难道想发动攻击？）

40030028.English_Text:
(There's a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>journal</>.
It might have some plans written in it...)
40030028.Chinese_Text:
（有个日志一样的东西。
里面可能写着计划...）

40030029.English_Text:
(Hm... This should be enough.
Let's return with the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>materials</>!)
40030029.Chinese_Text:
（唔...差不多了，
带着材料回去吧！）

40030030.English_Text:
(This should be enough, right?
Let's start heading back.)
40030030.Chinese_Text:
（这么多应该足够吧？
该回去了。）

40030031.Chinese_Text:
（先去蛇头菇群落
看看吧！）

40030032.Chinese_Text:
（抓一些用于制作药物
的蛇头菇吧！）

40030033.English_Text:
(Let's catch just enough
so that there's not too much to carry.)
40030033.Chinese_Text:
（抓的数量够两手拿
就可以了。）

40030034.English_Text:
(I didn't know mushroom beer
and stew was that important.)
40030034.Chinese_Text:
（原来蘑菇酒与火锅
还有这一层含义。）

40030035.English_Text:
(I must check
if it's a real ghost.)
40030035.Chinese_Text:
（确认一下
是不是真的魂灵吧。）

40030037.English_Text:
(He must've not liked it.
Let's go into the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>cemetery</>.)
40030037.Chinese_Text:
（看来他不喜欢。
去墓地内部看看吧。）

40030038.English_Text:
(Someone's over there.
Huh? It seems to be a ghost.)

40030039.English_Text:
(I should help out
in a situation like this.)

40030040.English_Text:
(It seems like it's all cleaned.
Let's return to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>keeper</>.)
40030040.Chinese_Text:
（清理好了。
回到管理兵那里吧。）

40030041.Original_Text: (임무를 다할 수 있도록\n그 혼령과 더 이상 마주치길 않길 기원해야지)
40030041.English_Text:
(Let's hope I don't encounter that ghost again
so that I can finish my mission.)
40030041.Chinese_Text:
（我本来期待着特别的结果，
但最后什么都没发生，很遗憾。）

40030042.English_Text:
(Still, I know that person
and should help if I can.)
40030042.Chinese_Text:
（好歹是个认识的人，
有需要就帮忙吧。）

40030043.English_Text:
A good amount
of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>flowers</> that you like should do.
40030043.Chinese_Text:
拜托你搜集一些
喜欢的花。

40030044.English_Text:
Oh, this quality is quite good.
Please follow me.
40030044.Chinese_Text:
状态很良好呢。
那就跟我来吧。

40030045.English_Text:
(He needed those flowers
because he's visiting a <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>grave</>.)
40030045.Chinese_Text:
（原来是为了来墓地
才准备花的。）

40030046.English_Text:
(Do they just need
the location of the base?)

40030047.Chinese_Text:
（先消灭周围的
赤匪派吧！）

40030052.English_Text:
(It wouldn't sit well with me
if an accident like that happens. Let's go.)
40030052.Chinese_Text:
（如果出事的话，
我会感觉不好受。还是去一下吧。）

40030053.English_Text:
(He just left
without saying a word...
Let's follow him.)
40030053.Chinese_Text:
（好像在那里。
去消除误会吧。）

40030055.English_Text:
Good! To the
next location, meow!
40030055.Chinese_Text:
好！移动至
下一个场所喵！

40030056.English_Text:
(Hmm... It looks dangerous...
Let's clean up the surroundings.)

40030057.Chinese_Text:
来，采集一下
这里的土喵！

40030058.English_Text:
(He doesn't seem to listen
to what others have to say.)
40030058.Chinese_Text:
（看来她几乎不听
别人的话。）

40030059.English_Text:
(I've finished collecting this stuff.
Should I try talking to it?)

40030060.English_Text:
(It's true that it's unpleasant.
Let's get rid of it.)

40030061.English_Text:
Good job, meow!
Here's your pay.
40030061.Chinese_Text:
辛苦了喵！
我会给你报酬喵。

40030062.Chinese_Text:
（最后还是做完了
所有事。）

40030063.English_Text:
(It was rather fun,
but this should end here.)
40030063.Chinese_Text:
（虽然很有趣，
不过还是结束吧。）

40030064.English_Text:
(There's a lot of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Mantises</> in the area.
He could get hurt...)
40030064.Chinese_Text:
（这里有很多人面虫，
这样下去可能会受伤...）

40030065.English_Text:
First, get rid of those
unpleasant things!
40030065.Chinese_Text:
先去消灭
那些恶心的家伙们喵！

40030066.English_Text:
Come here
and listen to me, mrrow.

40030067.English_Text: (He could've thought of it that way.)

40030068.English_Text:
(A safety railing
seems to be a good idea.)
40030068.Chinese_Text:
（设置安全栏杆
是个好主意。）

40030070.English_Text:
(This should be
enough to use for grease.)
40030070.Chinese_Text:
（这么多应该
足够涂抹了。）

40030076.Chinese_Text:
（出大事了。
乐猿族攻过来了！）

40030078.English_Text:
(What a relief.
Things seem to have calmed down.)

40030082.English_Text:
(I should be
able to help with that.)
40030082.Chinese_Text: （这种程度的话，我应该能提供帮助。）

40030084.English_Text: (I did my best to reduce the numbers...)

40030085.Chinese_Text:
（这不是一个人
能做的事情。）

40030086.Chinese_Text:
（去看一下
有多少<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>夜鬼</>吧。）

40030087.English_Text:
(With this many of them...
even a stroll would be a challenge.)
40030087.Chinese_Text:
（这种程度的话…
根本无法在海边散步。）

40030088.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>夜鬼</>到底
是从哪里来的？）

40030090.English_Text:
(I should clean up
the way there.)
40030090.Chinese_Text:
（先清理一下
前面的路吧。）

40030093.English_Text: (The road here is pretty rough, too.)

40030095.English_Text:
(We managed to
make it back here...)
40030095.Chinese_Text:
（虽然顺利地
回到了这里…）

40030097.English_Text:
(It doesn't feel right.
If he leaves, he will get lost.)
40030097.Chinese_Text:
（掉进奇怪的地方
会迷路。）

40030099.English_Text:
(Combative extermination?
I can just kill them, right?)
40030099.Chinese_Text:
（战斗杀虫？
消灭了就没事吧？）

40030101.English_Text:
(A regular task...
It must be pretty annoying.)
40030101.Chinese_Text:
（定期作业吗…
听起来很麻烦。）

40030103.English_Text:
(The giant monster
doesn't seem to be here.)

40030105.English_Text:
(This should be
more than enough, right?)

40030106.English_Text:
(Is that what he meant
by gathering the moss?)
40030106.Chinese_Text:
（只要得到就行
原来是这种意思？）

40030107.English_Text: (It does seem to be a concern.)

40030108.English_Text:
(Did their numbers decrease?
I hope I was able to help.)
40030108.Chinese_Text:
（数量应该减少了吧？
希望这样能起到帮助。）

40030109.English_Text:
(It's not enough.
I should look some more.)

40030110.English_Text: (Maybe I should take just one more.)

40030113.English_Text: (I'd better get as much wood as I can.)

40030114.English_Text: (It's better to err on the side of caution.)

40030116.English_Text:
See you at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Blood Rain Forest</>.
Small.

40030117.English_Text:
I think we should take a look at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Blood Plague</> first 
.
40030117.Chinese_Text:
우선 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>혈비패 기지</>를 
살펴봐야 할 것 같습니다.

40030118.English_Text:
Be careful not to be attacked by <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blood Plaque</> on the way
!
40030118.Chinese_Text:
가는 길에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</>의 습격을
받지 않게 조심하십시오!

40030120.English_Text:
You must now obtain
their <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heist Plan</>.
40030120.Chinese_Text:
이제 그들의 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>습격 계획서</>를
손에 넣어야 합니다.

40030122.English_Text:
I think you can install
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Trap</> in the indicated location.
40030122.Chinese_Text:
표시된 위치에 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>함정</>을
설치해주시면 될 것 같습니다.

40030123.English_Text:
(Installation is complete. 
Let's go back to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Red plum</>)

40030125.English_Text:
After all, you need to know
 your skills.

40030126.Original_Text: 부탁한 김에 늪지에 있는 \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>매화단 단장의 환영</>도 \n좀 부탁하네.
40030126.English_Text:
Ask for 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Illustration of the head of the plum flower troupe</> in the swamp at your request.
40030126.Chinese_Text:
부탁한 김에 늪지에 있는 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>매화단 단장의 환영</>도 
좀 부탁하네.

40030127.English_Text:
It is you too.
See you in the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>frontier</>.

40030129.English_Text:
First of all, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Snake Mushrooms</>
Please ask for a lot of places!

40030131.English_Text:
Ah?! <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>A human I met
at the base of the Abundant Rainforest</>!

40030133.English_Text: Look at me for a second.

40030136.English_Text:
The circulation of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>poached</> must also be stopped
.

40030138.English_Text:
(I'll have to find a way back
)

40030143.English_Text:
What is it, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Steel Fist</>.
I told you to do it yourself.

40030144.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Moon, Moonlight</>?!
Hey, what's going on here?

40030147.Original_Text: 조용히 해.\n아 참, 하나만 더 부탁할게.
40030147.English_Text:
Be quiet.
Oh, I'll ask you one more thing.
40030147.Chinese_Text:
조용히 해.
아 참, 하나만 더 부탁할게.

40030148.English_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bring me some black mud</>.
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Horyong Kwak, Sangjeonju</> 
It was specially recommended.
40030148.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검은 진흙</>을 좀 가져다줘.
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>곽호룡 상전주</>가
특별히 추천하더라고.

40030149.English_Text:
It's good quality soil.
Now, here's the reward.
40030149.Chinese_Text:
품질 좋은 흙이네.
자, 여기 보상이야.

40030153.English_Text:
Keep them
away a little bit from the aisle.

40030154.Original_Text: 그 정도면 될 것 같네.\n역시 자네야.
40030154.English_Text:
I think that's enough.
It's you too.
40030154.Chinese_Text:
그 정도면 될 것 같네.
역시 자네야.

40030155.English_Text: Then I'll be waiting for you at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Shelter</>.

40030157.English_Text:
I think you should
rescue the leaves.

40030158.English_Text:
The workers are so frightened
and swallowed up.
I'll beg you.
40030158.Chinese_Text:
일꾼들이 워낙 겁을
집어삼켜서 말이야.
부탁하겠네.

40030159.English_Text:
Thanks to you,
the preparations for the event went well.

40030160.English_Text:
It's small, but it's a prepared
compensation.

40030162.English_Text:
Thank you. Small.
It has been a great help.

40030163.English_Text:
Go to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>The Forest South of the Falls</>
and you'll see a familiar face.
40030163.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>폭포 남부 숲</>으로
가보시면 반가운
얼굴을 보실 겁니다.

40030165.English_Text:
May they rest in peace...
Thank you.

40030166.English_Text: Red plum, the leader of the plum flower group

40030176.Original_Text: (나를 부르는 것 같은데…\n다른 바롱과는 사뭇 달라보인다)
40030176.English_Text: (It seems to be calling me…\nIt looks quite different from other barongs)
40030176.Chinese_Text: （好像是在呼唤我……\n看起来和其他巴龙很不一样）

40030177.Chinese_Text: （巴龙已经消失了。\n奇怪的可疑……）

40030178.English_Text: (Be sure to use \nYaru's Box when you get a Spirit Stone)
40030178.Chinese_Text: （获得灵石时一定要使用\nYaru's Box）

40034500.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Let's listen to the story of the spirit of Jilin </>)
40034500.Chinese_Text: （<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>让我们倾听吉林精神的故事</>）

40034501.Original_Text: 너! 그거 누구 주면 안 돼!\n잃어버려도 안돼!!\n버리는 건 더더욱 안돼-!
40034501.English_Text: you! I can not give you anyone! \n Lost can not do it!
40034501.Chinese_Text: 你！我不能给你任何人！ \n丢失不能做到！

40034502.Original_Text: (그냥 그렇게 간다고?\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>모래시계</>는 왜 날 주고 가?\n진짜 간 거야???)
40034502.English_Text: (Just so go so? \n  Why do you give me a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>hourglass</>? \n ?????)
40034502.Chinese_Text: （所以走了吗？\n为什么你给我一个<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>沙漏</>？\n ?????）

40034503.Original_Text: (아까 그 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>바롱</>이다.\n직접 올 거면서\n왜 날 보낸 거야?)
40034503.English_Text: (It is <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Baru </>. \n Why do you send me directly?

40034506.English_Text: (I have a picture of somewhere wrong. \n Let's not force it!)
40034506.Chinese_Text: （我有错误的照片。\n让我们不强迫！）
